BVR kill chain: Russia's 5th-gen platform with N036 Byelka AESA radar (400 km detection), internal bays for 6 R-77M/R-37M BVR missiles, and low RCS for first-shot advantage; integrates with A-50U via secure datalinks for 350+ km networked envelopes; 2024 deliveries boosted to 3 squadrons by late 2025. F2T2EA: Su-57 Find/Fix; Tracks R-77M; Targets seeker S-111; Engage BVR; Assess Byelka.
Associated products: N036 Byelka AESA, R-77M hypersonic BVR missile, S-111 BVR seeker

BVR kill chain: 4.5-gen supermaneuverable jet with Irbis-E PESA radar (400 km range), thrust-vectoring, and 12 external BVR missiles (up to 8 R-37M); excels in lofted launches and ECCM for high Pk at NEZ; core of VKS fighter fleet, with 16 added in 2024. F2T2EA: Irbis-E Find/Fix; Tracks thrust-vector; Targets R-37M; Engage lofted; Assess ECCM.
Associated products: Irbis-E PESA radar, R-37M hypersonic BVR missile, L402 Himalayas EW suite
Airport: Besovets Air Base, Centralnaya Uglovaya Air Base

BVR kill chain: Twin-seat long-range platform with Bars-R AESA radar (200+ km), 12-missile BVR loadout, and thrust-vectoring for sustained engagements; SM2 upgrades add hypersonic R-37M; vital for two-ship tactics and A-50 cueing, with 4 more delivered in 2024. F2T2EA: Bars-R Find/Fix; Tracks 12-missile; Targets R-37M; Engage two-ship; Assess upgrades.
Associated products: Bars-R AESA radar, R-37M hypersonic BVR missile, A-50U
Airport: Kursk Vostochny Airport, Kubinka Air Base

BVR kill chain: Mach 2.8 high-altitude interceptor with Zhuk-MS upgrade (300 km detection), specialized for 4-6 R-37M launches against AWACS/tankers; extends BVR envelope to 400 km via OTH integration; backbone of air defense, with ongoing BM modernizations. F2T2EA: Zhuk-MS Find/Fix high-alt; Tracks R-37M; Targets AWACS; Engage 400 km; Assess OTH.
Associated products: Zhuk-MS radar, R-37M hypersonic BVR missile, OTH integration
Airport: Savasleyka Air Base, Borisovsky Khotilovo Air Base

BVR kill chain: Armored multirole with Kopyo-34 AESA (200 km), 8-12 BVR missiles, and Khibiny EW suite for self-protection; supports SEAD/BVR in contested airspace; fleet grew by 24 in 2024, emphasizing hybrid manned-unmanned ops with Lancet drones. F2T2EA: Kopyo-34 Find/Fix; Tracks Khibiny; Targets 8-12 BVR; Engage SEAD; Assess hybrid.
Associated products: Kopyo-34 AESA, Khibiny EW suite, R-77M hypersonic BVR missile

BVR kill chain: Upgraded 4th-gen with Zhuk-ME AESA radar (160 km), conformal fuel tanks for extended loiter, and 6 R-77M pylons; cost-effective BVR filler for forward basing; ~15 active post-2022 losses, with upgrades focusing on datalink compatibility. F2T2EA: Zhuk-ME Find/Fix; Tracks conformal; Targets R-77M; Engage forward; Assess datalink.
Associated products: Zhuk-ME AESA radar, R-77M hypersonic BVR missile, conformal fuel tanks

BVR kill chain: Modernized Flanker baseline with Bars radar (200 km) and 10 BVR missiles; bridges to Su-35 in reserves; limited but reliable for surge ops, integrated with L-band ground radars for cueing. F2T2EA: Bars Find/Fix; Tracks 10 BVR; Targets surge; Engage reserves; Assess L-band.
Associated products: Bars radar, R-77M hypersonic BVR missile, L-band ground radars

BVR kill chain: Upgraded AEW with Vega-M radar (400 km horizon) for off-board targeting and mid-course missile updates; critical kill-chain enabler despite losses (6 operational post-upgrades); 2025 focus on Il-76A-90 replacements. F2T2EA: Vega-M Find/Fix horizon; Tracks off-board; Targets missile updates; Engage enabler; Assess upgrades.
Associated products: Vega-M radar, secure datalinks, Sukhoi Su-57

BVR kill chain: Side-looking AESA radar for Su-57 with 400 km detection and multi-target engagement; full integration enhances stealth BVR. F2T2EA: Su-57 Find/Fix; Tracks R-77M; Targets seeker S-111; Engage BVR; Assess Byelka.
Associated products: R-77M hypersonic BVR missile, S-111 BVR seeker, Su-35S fire-control

BVR kill chain: Active radar homing seeker for R-77M integration on Su-57; terminal guidance for high-Pk kills. F2T2EA: Seeker for Engage R-77M; Active homing; Targets terminal; Assess integrated.
Associated products: R-77M hypersonic BVR missile, N036 Byelka AESA, KRET seekers

BVR kill chain: Integrated EW system for Su-57 with jamming and deception; protects during BVR engagements. F2T2EA: EW Track protection Su-57; Fixes threats; Targets homing heads; Engage supported; Assess Himalayas.
Associated products: N036 Byelka AESA, R-37M hypersonic BVR missile, S-111 BVR seeker

BVR kill chain: Low-observable UCAV follow-on for Su-35 integration; internal BVR bay for autonomous strikes. F2T2EA: Low-obs Find bay; Tracks Su-35; Targets BVR missiles; Engage integrated; Assess follow-on.
Associated products: Su-35S, R-37M hypersonic BVR missile, L402 Himalayas EW suite

BVR kill chain: Stealth UCAV with internal bay for R-77M; datalink to Su-57 for loyal wingman roles. F2T2EA: Stealth Find bay; Tracks to Su-57; Targets R-77M; Engage datalink; Assess UCAV integration.
Associated products: Su-57, R-77M hypersonic BVR missile, N036 Byelka AESA

BVR kill chain: Very long-range hypersonic missile for MiG-31/Su-35; 400 km envelope against high-value targets. F2T2EA: Very long Engage hypersonic; Post-Find by AWACS; Targets bombers; Assess M speed.
Associated products: S-70 Okhotnik-B stealth UCAV, N036 Byelka AESA, RVV-AE-PD

BVR kill chain: Medium-range hypersonic missile for Su-57 internal carriage; active seekers for contested BVR. F2T2EA: Hypersonic Engage after Byelka Track; Active seekers; Targets Su-57; Assess M variant.

BVR kill chain: PD variant for high-maneuverability engagements; datalink for export Su-30/35. F2T2EA: PD variant Engage maneuverable; Tracks datalink; Targets export; Assess Russian.
Associated products: R-77M hypersonic BVR missile, S-111 BVR seeker, L402 Himalayas EW suite
